name: devoid
content:
be devoid of something
Add to word list
Add to word list
to lack or be without something that is necessary or usual: Their apartment is devoid of all comforts. He seems to be devoid of compassion. Synonym
free

devoid of
Add to word list
Add to word list
Someone or something is devoid of something when it is completely lacking: He seems to be devoid of any feeling for his parents.
